fallback_summary: ITEPEKIMAB-χ1 is a SEI-rescued blueprint derived from the failed Regeneron IL-33 antibody trial in COPD. It corrects key faults using logic-based modulation, epithelial repair, and cytokine compensation suppression.
core_logic_nodes: IL-1β and IL-17A suppression via FDC gatekeepers
Epithelial restoration circuit using zinc and selenium logic
Trial stratification based on IL-33 and EDI biomarkers

qa_examples.question: Why did the original Itepekimab trial fail?
How is χ1 different from Itepekimab?
What are the trial design changes in χ1?
What kind of patient will respond to χ1?
